nodes.text: Beray was a location on the Keshtah Minor continent on the planet Kesh during the Time of the Rot. It housed a political faction of the Lost Tribe of Sith, to which the father of Sith Caretaker Varner Hilts belonged.
While the location of Beray is mentioned in the eBook Lost Tribe of the Sith: Secrets, what kind of location it is—city, landform, or otherwise—is not specified.
